abstract: Diplomatic Memo; claims by Obama administration that Iranian officials backed a plot to assassinate Adel al-Jubeir, Saudi ambassador to the United States, have pushed the soft-spoken Jubeir back into media glare;  Jubeir has studiously avoided limelight in attempt to distance himself from a 1990s reputation as a playboy.
snippet: Before a plot was supposedly hatched to assassinate him, Adel al-Jubeir, the Saudi ambassador to the United States, tried to stay out of the spotlight, having once been a man about town.
lead_paragraph: Before a plot was supposedly hatched to assassinate him, Adel al-Jubeir, the Saudi ambassador to the United States, tried to stay out of the spotlight, having once been a man about town.

headline.main: Wild Days Behind Him, Envoy Keeps Low Profile
headline.print_headline: Wild Days Behind Him, Envoy Keeps Low Profile
headline.seo: Wild Days Behind Him, Saudi Envoy, Jubeir, Keeps Low Profile
